name: Heretic Annihilator
description:
This is a small game that I created for personal use purposes and as an element of my Game Dev portfolio. It's been created with use of free assets, available via Unity Assets Store. The game is inspired by oldschool, space shooters and the universe of Warhammer 40.000.

I do not claim any rights to presented assets or sounds, only to the work that I conducted to create the program. I do not gain any financial benefits from this "product".
